entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning.
